name: LMNH Issue Template
about: Template for raising issues with the repo
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: AdamJC20, DevMjee, SamiL52, r-mar3, guavacat23

---

Description:
 - What is the issue?
 - What is the problem that needs solving?
 - Why is this an issue that needs resolving?

Assignees:
 - Who will this issue be assigned to?

Urgency:
 - How important is this issue to resolve?
 - When does this need to be resolved by?
